reviews.review_msg: Hands down the best professor! Teaches with clarity, passion, and keeps the class engaged. She makes learning truly enjoyable.

Professor Parvathy's teaching style focuses on readings and class discussions, which means that she highly appreciates any inputs from the class. The readings are not too long, but be prepared to come to class having done some reading and participate. Grading mostly by 2 midterms (no memorization needed), final group project, and participation.
